name: Project AI-Bo
description:
Controls

-A/D: move

-W or Space: jump

-[1,2,3,4,5]: alternate between logic piece

Right click bottom leg screen to repair AI-Bo
Engineering tutorial:

Connect a wire from the single input (colored square) to the two outputs. Signals must match.
Split signal in two using the gates under the 3 key.

Change the wire's signal with the gates under the 4 key. ! swaps red to green and vice versa.
Dotted outline sets signal to that color.

The game is beatable but not without bugs

Programming: @tamiks_properer

Art: @loveboxf

Music: @rickyslicc
